Title: Awaken, Legendary Warrior... Son Goku, the Super Saiyan!
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Plot: With the help of his friends, Goku succeeds in blasting Frieza with a gargantuan Spirit Bomb! Victory seems assured, but when the monster remerges to strike a shockingly fatal blow - Goku undergoes a powerful transformation!
